video:video.video:title: Meet Groove
video:video.video:description: Groove is the period tracker you've been waiting for. This stunning app automatically customizes and adapts based on YOUR unique data. Learn about YOUR body and achieve YOUR goals with the help of Groove. It gets more accurate over time and uses advanced algorithms to predict your next period. Take control of YOUR body and YOUR cycles with Groove! Download Groove for iPhone: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id831795151 Visit Groove's website: http://www.readytogroove.com
